channel.title: How to make a safezone?
channel.description:
Ok this is really annoying me...i recenlty decided to change my home (which went successful) and now the problem is my home is where everyone can att each other...i want to make it a safe zone...but HAVE OF CLUE HOW TOO...if somone could maybe post a tut and codes showing me how i would greatly appericate it.
Thanks. :cool:

item.title: How to make a safezone?
item.dc:creator: @deathbadger deathbadger
item.description:
@deathbadger wrote:

umm…hold on…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 09:33:26 AM[/size][hr]it was 7 errors,i think i put it in wrong or somthing, that’s what my main problem is i don’t know where to put it in…and i don’t get the whole “square” idea…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 09:39:40 AM[/size][hr]somone please help :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 09:42:34 AM[/size][hr]anyone?..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 11:25:45 AM[/size][hr]SOMONE HELP ME PLEASE…

item.title: How to make a safezone?
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

ok heres what you do…
search for nonwild
add the codes like this || (absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2)
x1 and y1 are coords for most Southwest point you want
x2 and y2 are coords for most Northeast point you want

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a safezone?
item.dc:creator: @deathbadger deathbadger
item.description:
@deathbadger wrote:

i’ve read all those guides…they haven’t helped at all…where i want to be a safe zone is x 3653 y 3460,x 3680 y 3512,maybe somone could send me a code that they have put those in a code and had it successful…where i would only have to copy and paste it into my files and it would work,because these guides CONFUSED THE HECK OUT OF ME,i’ve tried so many times,got nothing but errors,or it didn’t work…

Read full topic
